melodymod:ObsidianStrike.NAME: Obsidian Strike
melodymod:ObsidianStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! damage per Rhythm until the end of combat

melodymod:BeginnerSteps.NAME: Beginner Steps
melodymod:BeginnerSteps.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. Dance 1: Draw 1 more card and refund 1
melodymod:BeginnerSteps.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. Dance 1, 4: Draw 1 more card and refund 1

melodymod:Clap.NAME: Clap
melodymod:Clap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Rhythm. Draw !M! card

melodymod:Semibreve.NAME: Semibreve
melodymod:Semibreve.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain !M! Rhythm

melodymod:Spin.NAME: Spin
melodymod:Spin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Tempo 3: add a ghost copy in your hand
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Add a ghost copy in your hand.

melodymod:Rest.NAME: Rest
melodymod:Rest.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Tempo 2: Gain !M! Block next turn

melodymod:RisingDove.NAME: Rising Dove
melodymod:RisingDove.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Dance 2: Apply !M! Weak

melodymod:PiercingChant.NAME: Piercing Chant
melodymod:PiercingChant.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the strength of all enemies by !M! for this turn. NL Gain 2 Rhythm. NL Exhaust

melodymod:PasDeDeux.NAME: Pas de Deux
melodymod:PasDeDeux.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Give 9 block. Dance 2: deal !D! damage to all enemies

melodymod:Refrain.NAME: Refrain
melodymod:Refrain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Rhythm at the start of your turn.

melodymod:BeatOfLife.NAME: Beat of Life
melodymod:BeatOfLife.DESCRIPTION: When you gain Rhythm, gain !M! time(s) as much block.

melodymod:ShiningStar.NAME: Shining Star
melodymod:ShiningStar.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a Dance from your draw pile. NL Dance 1: gain Rhythm equal to that dance's cost.
melodymod:ShiningStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch a Dance from your draw pile. Dance 1, 2, 3: gain Rhythm equal to that dance's cost.

mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X+1 times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.

mysticmodref:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
mysticmodref:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Costs [E] less for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[]. Deal !D! damage twice, then double the [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] amounts.
